name: Train Runner
description:
In Train Runner, you play as a young boy who was taking a trip with his family across the country on the newly built train lines. However, a hijacker has taken control of the trains and is trying to sabotage the railways and endanger all the passengers! You must run along the tops of the trains jumping and ducking under obstacles to reach the engine and stop the hijacker. 

Controls:

The character runs automatically, so there's no need to move back and forth across the screen.

Jump: Press the spacebar to avoid obstacles and over gaps!

Fighting: Press the spacebar repeatedly to fight the hijacker!
